page.title: 08LEISURE AT HOME IN SWINDERBY
page.content: {Gardening}is a popular activity in Swinderby. All the houses have a plot of land. Many people have lawns with just a few{flowers}such as daffodils, pansies,tulips,wallflowers,lupins and roses.Ornamental trees and shrubs like cherry, almond and lilac are grown. Many families like to produce their own{vegetables}as these are fresher, cheaper and taste better than those in the shops. The ground is prepared during the winter and the seeds sown in the spring.Their crops of lettuces, peas,potatoes and other vegetables are harvested from June onwards with the {fruit crops}like raspberries, apples, strawberries, pears and rhubarb. At other times people often watch {television}or listen to the radio or records.They may{read}books, magazines or the daily newspaper or may play musical instruments or computer games.
